Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Manufacturer’s warranties may not apply in all cases, depending on factors like the use of the product, where the product was purchased, or who you purchased the product from. Please review the warranty carefully, and contact the manufacturer if you have any questions.

Price: $31.99 - $26.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 12:43:43 UTC – Details)


“A murder at the local dive bar. A mysterious, masked figure. A small town full of suspects. When owner Nick Webster falls from a cliff behind his roadside tavern, his death is ruled an accident. But one of his employees suspects foul play, and she needs your help to prove it. Players channel their inner detective to investigate the murder at the Old Scratch Tavern. Uncover the motives of each suspect through ciphers, clues, and puzzles that progress the story to its thrilling conclusion. Realistic evidence and documents guide players through a challenging and immersive experience with tons of twists and turns. Do you have what it takes. To Hunt A Killer? Since 2016, Hunt A Killer has been delivering the most realistic, captivating and immersive experiences to fulfill the inner detective in us all. Their mission is to revolutionize the entertainment industry by challenging conventional forms of storytelling. They provide interactive entertainment experiences that position participants as characters in their very own thrilling murder mystery stories. “I love puzzles and my fiance loves true crime, so Hunt A Killer is perfect for us The materials have an authentic feel and make the whole experience that much more engaging. We feel like real detectives ” – Michaela”.
THE WORLD’S NUMBER 1 MURDER MYSTERY COMPANY – Hunt A Killer has shipped over 2 million boxes to murder mystery fans all over the world. They’ve taken all of their expertise and created an immersive investigation that can be played in 1 sitting.
An authentic and immersive investigation. You’ll feel like you are solving a real-life murder mystery
Decode ciphers, piece together clues, consider all the evidence and solve the crime. It’s like an escape room delivered right to your door.
A great option for date night, game night, teaming up with friends and family, or just playing on your own.
For 1-5 players. 45-60 minute playing time. Ages 14 plus.

Read more

Hunt A Killer: Death At The Dive Bar

BECOME A DETECTIVE

A murder at the local dive bar. A mysterious, masked figure. A small town full of suspects. When owner Nick Webster falls from a cliff behind his roadside tavern, his death is ruled an accident. But one of his employees suspects foul play, and she needs your help to prove it.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF

Players channel their inner detective to investigate the murder at the Old Scratch Tavern. Uncover the motives of each suspect through ciphers, clues, and puzzles that progress the story to its thrilling conclusion. Realistic evidence and documents guide players through a challenging and immersive experience with tons of twists and turns.

Specifications

  • For 1-5 Players
  • 45-60 minute playing time
  • Ages 14+

Read more

Do You Have What It Takes?

Old-fashioned detective work

Sort through testimonials, create timelines, pore over evidence and confirm alibis to crack the case and catch the killer.

Crack the codes

Hunt A Killer is packed with puzzles and ciphers that are not for the faint of heart. But the reward is well worth the effort. Every puzzle will unlock details about the events and characters that were involved in the murder of Nick Webster.

Every detail matters

Our team of true-crime aficionados have meticulously created a living, breathing world where you become a part of the story. Each suspect has a detailed backstory, distinct handwriting, and other forensic details that will help you eliminate them from your list of suspects

Read more

What’s in the box?

An All-In-One Experience

Solve an entire investigation in one sitting. This is perfect for family gatherings, to play on the go, or if you want to see what it’s like to Hunt A Killer.

Handcrafted Evidence

This box is packed with evidence that you can actually touch and feel. Everything from the autopsy report to the items found at the crime scene are designed to place you in the role of lead detective in a homicide investigation.

First-In-Class Experience

Hunt A Killer is the world’s premiere murder mystery company. Since 2016, we have been putting you in the detective’s seat and challenging you to Hunt A Killer.

Help When You Need It

Worried that it will be too challenging? Each case has a dedicated hints page that offers non-spoiler hints for each item in the box as well as solutions if you are really stuck.

Read more





Death at The Dive Bar
Body On The Boardwalk
Nancy Drew
Agatha Christie’s The Mystery at Hunter’s Lodge
Moon Summit Mystery Complete Box
Melancholy Killer

Warranty & Support

Product Warranty: For warranty information about this product, please click here

Price: $23.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 06:17:44 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Turn the backseat into a closet on wheels

Traveling in the car with dresses and clothes?Yes,This Car Clothes Hanger Bar from Mysbiker makes it easy to keep your clothes tidy and clean. when you’re on the go. Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .This bar can be attached to the overhead handles or garment hooks on your back seat, It’s more stable and it accommodates a far greater load than traditional bars.You may need this during a road trip, family vacations, or before an important meeting.

Easy To Install And Expand Without Much Effort

Two Ways to Install: Fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook.Universal Fit: The bysbiker expandable clothes bar can extend from 35 in to 59 in. This allows more space for hanging and to perfectly fit most vehicles.Perfect for college students, movings,and cross-country road tours.Rubberized grip sleeves and dividers keep clothes from sliding during driving.Easy to Install: The bar has dual mount hangers that can quickly attach to interior grab handles and garment hooks,no tools required.

Heavy-duty Metal Car Clothes Bar

Heavy-duty, metal car clothes bar holds up to 30 lbs.Perfect for college students, moving, vacationers and cross-country road tours, it expands from 35″ to 59″ to fit most cars, and features adjustable grip sleeves and dividers to keep clothes from sliding, even on the tightest turns.

Extendable

Universal Fit with Extendable Bars: Our extendable clothes bar can extend from 35 inches to 59 inches and maximally holds up to 30 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans, vans, SUVs,Trucks and more.

Non-Slip Rubber Grips

The expandable Car Clothes Bar is covered with anti-slip rubber to keep the clothes from sliding around during driving.

Material
PVC+TPU ABS+Rubber Alloy steel Alloy Steel+Rubber

Color
Black Black Silver/Black Black

Size
8.3 x 6.1 x 3.6″ 6.7 x 2.4 x 3.9″ 10.6 x 4.5 x 1.9″ 36 x 2.6 x 2.5″

Application
Phone below 6.5″ like Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. 4″-6.5″devices： Such as Iphone12、11,Pro Max X XR Xs 7s 8 Plus 7 6s 6, Samsung Galaxy S20 S10 S9 A71 A51 A10,Note20 10 /9/8/4,Xiaomi, Huawei, oppo LG, Sony, Moto, Google Pixel, Nexus etc. Motorcycles, bicycles, scooters and any vehicle where there are holes or spokes on a wheel. Sedans,Vans,SUVs,Trucks and Jeep.Such as Ford (Focus ST Explorer)、 Honda CRV、 Toyota （Corolla E350 ）、Chrysler （Mini Van 2019 f250）、 Equinox 、Canyon 、Nissan （Pathfinder）、Rogue、 Murano、 Traverse 、Acadia（2014 GMC ）and etc.

Key Feature
Universal fit,Waterproof,Sensitive Tough Screen,Large Capacity Shockproof,360°Rotation,Wide Compatibility,One-hand Operation,Waterproof Easy to Lock, 110dB Alarm Deterrent, Waterproof, Anti-theft Expand up to 65 inches,Durable and Load-bearing,Easy to Install

►A Moving Wardrobe: The Mysbiker car clothes hanger bar would keep your clothes wrinkle-free during road trips,family vacations,laundry or business trips where your clothes need to be kept or hung neatly without collapsing in your vehicles.This clothes bar is Really helped in packing for a cross country trip,car camping.Just a magic wand will turn your car into a mobile wardrobe.
►Universal Fit: The vehicle clothes hanging rack that fits most every vehicle on the road.Expandable from 33 inch to 63.5 inch easy to adjust the length,max holds up to 50 lbs of clothing to accommodate sedans,vans,SUVs,Trucks and more.
► Rubber Grips and Rings: The clothes rod bar adopts 3 sections of Non-Slip Grips Dividers and rubberized grip sleeves enable you to organize and not worry about things flying all over the place , even on tight turns for a smoother.so you can hang a suit, dress shirts, button ups, pants, etc
►Durable and Load-bearing: The Car Hanger are constructed of rust-resistant, powder coated steel,which is durable and load-bearing. Up to 50 pounds (approximately 22.7 kg), which means you can hang 80-100 T-shirts or 40-50 suits at the same time even when fully extended.
►Easy to Install: There are two ways to connect the hanging bar : fix the end hook in the lower position to hook the handle, or rotate vertically to hang on the ceiling hook. just pivoting end hangers can be turned down to hook over car grab handles, or rotated upright to hang securely from garment hooks.

Whether you’re traveling for work or just taking a road trip.Your clothes will stay fresh and wrinkled- free as they hanging in your vehicle .

CRAFTED – The necklace is 18″ long plus a 2″ extender and is finely crafted with a 14K Yellow Gold Plating to ensure a long lasting and brilliant finish.
✦ 90-DAY GUARANTEE ✦ Your happiness is our number one priority. To ensure your complete satisfaction, we offer a hassle-free 90-Day money-back guarantee. To get in touch, email or chat with us – a member of our team will be happy to help you.
✦ SUSTAINABILITY ✦ We’re committed to protecting the planet. That’s why every piece of PAVOI jewelry is crafted with 100% recycled materials and we package in 99% recycled and compostable materials. We are proudly carbon-neutral and completely offset our plastic consumption by removing over 275,000 plastic bottles from our ocean annually. Learn more about our sustainability efforts here.

(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:50 UTC – Details)


Pin Boards for Walls

Detail Specifications
● Safe and odourless.
● Clean and clutter-free edges.
● Keep things handy, Pretty Decoration.

Package Content
● 4 Piece of pin boards for walls.
● 40 candy-colored push pins for daily use.
If you want to bring a pop of color and dimension to your home without changing too much, or cover up imperfections in an accessible fashion, you can not miss this small bulletin board set.
Choose different push pin board strips for several spots while blending into your decor. More possibilities than a traditional cork board. A good way to leave your messages, display your collections, pictures and impress everyone who comes to visit it!
Pin reminders, notes in a variety of places so you won’t miss any important dates, tasks. The 13”×2”×0.35” cute bulletin board allows you to make full use of small space. Like the door, closet, refrigerator, bookcase, mirror, etc.
Easy to remove the mini bulletin board without ruining your walls. Perfect for a rental property or public place like classroom, office, dorm room, apartment complex.
Coming 4 bulletin board strips and 40 push pins in one package. The length of the needle is shorter than the thickness of felt strip, won’t protrude from the wall. Not recommended on textured walls.

4.5
Price: $14.99 - $13.99
(as of Nov 29,2022 10:17:50 UTC – Details)
